adDetails: Laying Foundations, Expanding Creativity, Awaking Aspiration www.alancrossmusic.com show contact info Lessons are taught out of Alan's home in Saratoga, CA and online via Skype and other helpful programs. His rates are $37/half hour, $55/fourty-five minutes, and $72/hour. To inquire about lessons, please write Alan at alancrossmusic (at) gmail (dot) com and when writing, please include the age of the student, a brief description of his or her playing experience, and the times/days you are available for lessons.
